Package com.larashores.laraspipes.datagen

Class LootTableCompositeProvider

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.data.loot.BlockLootSubProvider
net.minecraft.data.loot.packs.VanillaBlockLoot
com.larashores.laraspipes.datagen.LootTableCompositeProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Supplier<net.minecraft.data.loot.LootTableSubProvider>, net.minecraft.data.loot.LootTableSubProvider
public class LootTableCompositeProvider extends net.minecraft.data.loot.packs.VanillaBlockLoot implements Supplier<net.minecraft.data.loot.LootTableSubProvider>
Provider that allows defining loot tables in multiple DataProviders instead of a single monolithic provider. Each DataProvider should implement the DataProvider.register(LootTableCompositeProvider) method to register its loot tables in the composite provider.

    • dropSelf

      public void dropSelf(net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block block)
      Registers a loot table for a block such that when destroyed it drops itself. Redefines this protected method from the superclass as public so that DataProviders can call it.
      Overrides:
      dropSelf in class net.minecraft.data.loot.BlockLootSubProvider
      Parameters:
      block - The block that should drop itself.
